traits.name: Skulker
entries: The ratling can take the Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

traits.name: Keen Smell
entries: The ratling has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The ratling has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the ratling's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Sling
entries: Ranged atk +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) bludgeoning damage.
